critique: The document is an executive order regarding the designation of an acting judge for the District Court of the United States for Puerto Rico. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is likely a sense of confidence and stability in the judicial system. There is no explicit mention of emotions, but the tone is formal and authoritative. I will score the emotions based on this understanding.
